short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to create accessible tutorials from browser using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension supports Accessible Tutorial Builder by Perception.ai.
You can start the extension and it will automatically record all the the browser interactions with the target tab like mouse clicks and keypresses.

Users can access the built flows from their account at https://tutorials.perceptionai.in
